entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 08:47 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure: 97.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -22.8°C
Wind: W 52 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
